mapper.select: select q.no, q.title, q.category, q.content, q.created_at, m.user_id, m.user_name from qna q join members m on q.author = m.user_id where no = #{no}
select q.no, q.title, q.category, q.content, q.created_at, m.user_id, m.user_name from qna q join members m on q.author = m.user_id order by no desc;
mapper.insert: insert into qna (title, category, content, author) values (#{title}, #{category}, #{content}, #{author.userId})
